title: Hourly Consultation
desc: Avail this service if you would like to do the filing by yourself. Only avail face to face consultation from me

title: Complete Filing-Skilled Immigration
desc: Avail this service if you are applying through the skilled immigration track and want to avail my full filing service.

title: Complete Filing-Business Immigration
desc: This service will provide you complete filing of all documents and forms for Business Track immigration. Act accordingly if you want to avail.

title: Post Immigration Settlement Service
desc: I also offer post immigration settlement service. Airport pickup, temp housing for the first month, bankins, schooling for children, all covered under the settlement package
